data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Stann Creek prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Stann Creek, Belize
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Stann Creek, Belize to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 35,291 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Stann Creek a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Stann Creek, Belize to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Jew, English-speaking people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Stann Creek, Belize.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Stann Creek, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.section_summary:
the state of Stann Creek, Belize has a population of 46,100.

We estimate Stann Creek has 10,809 people who might know Jesus, 28,946 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 6,345 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 28,946 people in the state of Stann Creek who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.
